Others: The Red Sox lost to the Toronto Blue Jays with a score of 2-0
Kutter Crawford pitched well, allowing two runs on six hits and two walks over 6 2/3 innings
Rich Hill made his debut for the Red Sox, pitching 1 1/3 innings with no runs and no hits
Nick Sogard was the only batter to record a hit off Blue Jays starter Bowden Francis
The Red Sox continue to face an uphill battle to reach the postseason
Rafael Devers is expected to return to the lineup Friday and serve as designated hitter
Liam Hendriks could rejoin the Red Sox as soon as next weekend
